features: [Perfect Size] Tired of thin chair cushions which don't fit your seats, trying Abroca upgraded thick seat cushion which measures 16.5 x 14.5 x 2.4 inches, is thicker than 90% of seat cushions on the market. Our seat pad for chairs has no problem with deformation or collapse like other thin size seat pads. Gel pads for pressure sores fit for most chairs, car seat, wheel chair, desk chair, church chair, kitchen and dinning chair, bleacher and recliner, stadium and gym chair.

[Pain & Pressure Relief ] Soreness and numbness caused by sedentary is because your chair is too stiff. Pressure relief seat cushion offers quick pain relief when your sciatica is raging, tailbone is aching and butt is sweating. Gel cushions for pressure sores help to lower coccyx pain, sciatica, back, hip, tailbone pain, hemorrhoid, pressure sores, buttock pain and bed sores,supporting your office chair cushions for back and butt to sit for long periods.

[Breathable and Cool] Different from memory foam cushions, gel cushion for sitting is made up of thousands of air columns, perfect structure to keep seat cushion for car seat driver breathable. With air circulating quickly, Car seat cushion pad allows for ventilation to reduce heat dissipation. When car seats get hot in the summer, car seat cooling pad brings you coolness and keeps sweat away.

[ Widely Application ] Gel seat cushion for long sitting pressure relief is suitable for all kinds of chairs or seats. Chair pad provides comfortable support. This is a gel seat cushion for lower back pain relief, seat cushion for desk chair, car seat cushions for driving butt pain, orthopedic cushion for lower back pain, wheelchair cushions for seniors, bleacher & stadium seat cushion for fans and a portable gel seat pad for yoga, the pregnant, long time periods of road trips and flights.

[ Private & Easy to Clean ] Public seat sometimes has an embarrassing hygiene conditions. You can take seat cushion with non-slip cover as your personal sitting pillow. The gel is water resistant and the zippered breathable cover is washable. Just remove the cover and toss in the washing machine.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Tired of thin chair cushions which don't fit your seats, trying Abroca upgraded thicker seat cushion which measures 16.5 x 14.5 x 2.4 inches, is thicker than 90% of seat cushions on the market. Our seat pad for chairs has no problem with deformation or collapse like other thin size seat pads. The thicker and softer the gel cushion is, the more comfortable you will get!

Different from memory foam cushions, gel cushions for sitting are made up of thousands of air columns, perfect structure to keep seat cushions breathable. Double layer 2.4 inches thicker, softer and more comfortable.

The zippered breathable non-slip cover is machine washable. Just remove the cover and toss in the washing machine. Please Put the anti-slip side towards the bottom so that the cover can rub against the chair to fix the position and not slide easily.

Gel pad helps to lower coccyx pain, sciatica, back, hip, tailbone pain, hemorrhoid, pressure sores, buttock pain and bed sores,supporting your office chair cushions for back and butt to sit for long periods.

Gel seat cushion for pressure relief is suitable for all kinds of chairs or seats. Chair pad provides comfortable support whether is at home or kitchen, in the office or the gym, on an airplane or a train. This is a gel seat cushion for lower back pain relief, seat cushion for desk chair, car seat cushions for driving butt pain, orthopedic cushion for lower back pain, wheelchair cushions for seniors. You can take anywhere and get comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and thick!
reviews.reviewText: I had 2 one inch versions I use stacked. I purchased this to replace them. It was good enough I ordered a second. While soft, they are much firmer and give better support than stacking the thinner ones. I had assumed they would be just thicker, the added support is a bonus!***************************************I neither received nor solicited recompense in any form for this review. I am a retired computer/network/telephone repair technician with more than 35 years experience. I have taught all these subjects at my employers in-house trade schools in addition to my field experience. Currently I repair/restore guitars and guitar amplifiers to support my guitar collecting habit. As such I perform electronics repair as well as some woodworking involved in repairing guitars an amplifier cabinets. I attempt to repair most items if they fail out of warranty, so my reviews may contain information you will not not find in other reviews. Solicitations to change or "enhance" reviews are always reported to Amazon without exception. Free items or money are joyfully accepted, THEN IMMEDIATELY REPORTED TO AMAZON!! THANK YOU!!!! The observations are my own without any outside influence or input. Your experience may differ from my own! Do your own research and comparisons prior to purchasing, don't rely solely on my observations. I recommend purchasing only from Prime sellers as much of my experience with "marketplace" sellers has been negative. Often drop shipping from China to the USA, and reshipping so it has a USA postmark. That said, do your own research prior to purchasing any products from the Internet!?

reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Kind of works for support but gel seems to compress down to chair. Helps some but not as expected.
reviews.reviewText: Kind of works for support but gel seems to compress down to chair. Helps some but not as expected.

Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I just opened it up and started using it and would’ve returned it if I started using it when I first received it it smashes down and does does not give much cushion over a wooden chair. If you weigh 150 pounds or less, it could possibly be a good chair cushion..

reviews.reviewText: Elderly parent needed extra support & a nonslip cushion

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this gel seat for my 90 yr old Mom and she loves. The new seat relieves pressure on her tail bone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Dog likes it more
reviews.reviewText: This cushion has a thin cloth to cover the hexagons so you feel all of the texture. To be usuables you need a thin pillow on top. I gave it to my dog because he likes to lay on it more than me.
The furniture needed a new seat but that was not possible. So this cushion solved the seated problem very well.
Made a big differance in hip soreness relief
